item.title: PATH
item.description: score:-38 Chances: UiPath has formed an alliance with Deloitte to accelerate the transformation of their clients’ businesses through AI-powered Intelligent Automation solutions. The company’s addressable market is rapidly expanding, indicating potential growth opportunities. The Federal Reserve’s Beige Book regional survey suggests a positive outlook for the U.
